title: Remove all matches from list - fix error

content.question: Which of the following changes can be made so that the method works as intended?

choices.label: In line 3, changing the loop initialization to  index = list.size() – 1
In line 3, changing the loop condition to  index > 0
In line 3, changing the loop increment to  index++
In line 5, changing the list access expression to  list.get(target)

content.answer: In line 3, changing the loop initialization to  index = list.size() – 1
